ValidationRule.description: Validates that the account Mailing State/Province is a valid two-character abbreviation if Mailing Country is Canada
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && AND ( BillingCountry = "Canada", OR( Len(BillingState)<2, NOT ( CONTAINS("AB:BC:MB:NB:NL:NT:NS:NU:ON:PE:QC:SK:YT:PEI",BillingState) )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A valid two-letter province is required.
